content: the gridster cowl is knit in a simple 4-row slip_stitch pattern that is easy to memorize the cowl is knit flat and seamed in the back to create an effortless warm hug around your neck the thick border edge keeps the cowl neat and tidy choose two sport or fingering weight yarns with high contrast for the best result 1 skein of each color you can also download this pattern for free from my website yarnhero com 1 with newsletter subscription 1 https //www yarnhero com/
